name: Blip Blop
description:
Blip Blop is a remaster of one of the oldest video games in world history. The player controls a paddle on their side of the screen to try to hit the ball away from themselves, and score a goal by bypassing the other players' paddle. 

The game may be played solo, or with a friend sharing the same device.

There are two play modes offered: Classic and Challenge.

Classic is the classical gameplay of Pong, and the challenge mode offers random challenges.
